channel.title: NPC's Wont show up
channel.description:
Okay, i've bought a vps, and everything is setup, java is installed, server is online and playable...
But on my VPS, no one can see NPC's including me! But on LocalHost I can. -.-
I get errors when I startup server on VPS. But I don't get any errors when I startup server on my desktop as localhost..
Here's errors: [code] [root@server1 Source]# java -Xmx1000m -cp bin:deps/poi.jar:deps/mysql.jar:deps/mina.jar:deps/slf4j.jar:deps/slf4j-nop.jar:deps/jython.jar:log4j-1.2.15.jar: server.Server ^[[Ajava.io.FileNotFoundException: ./data/cfg/prices.txt (No such file or directory) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:138) at java.util.Scanner.<init>(Scanner.java:656) at server.world.ItemHandler.loadItemPrices(ItemHandler.java:316) at server.world.ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:35) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:67) ./Data/CFG/npc.cfg: file not found. ./Data/CFG/spawn-config.cfg: file not found. shops.cfg: file not found. java.io.FileNotFoundException: data/lolmap.bin (No such file or directory) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.open(Native Method) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.<init>(RandomAccessFile.java:233) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.<init>(RandomAccessFile.java:118) at server.world.WalkingHandler.initialize(WalkingHandler.java:45) at server.Server.main(Server.java:119) [7/22/12 6:41 PM]: Launching EternalRuins... [7/22/12 6:41 PM]: java.io.FileNotFoundException: data/lolmap.bin (No such file or directory) [7/22/12 6:41 PM]: at java.io.RandomAccessFile.open(Native Method) [7/22/12 6:41 PM]: at java.io.RandomAccessFile.<init>(RandomAccessFile.java:233) [7/22/12 6:41 PM]: at java.io.RandomAccessFile.<init>(RandomAccessFile.java:118) [7/22/12 6:41 PM]: at server.world.WalkingHandler.initialize(WalkingHandler.java:45) [7/22/12 6:41 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:174) [7/22/12 6:41 PM]: Server listening on port 127.0.0.1:43594 [/code]
Also I saw in there its missing 2 files, even though they're both there!

item.title: NPC's Wont show up
item.dc:creator: @joelandjacob joelandjacob
item.description:
@joelandjacob wrote:

Okay, i’ve bought a vps, and everything is setup, java is installed, server is online and playable…

But on my VPS, no one can see NPC’s including me!
But on LocalHost I can. -.-

I get errors when I startup server on VPS.
But I don’t get any errors when I startup server on my desktop as localhost…

Here’s errors:

[root@server1 Source]# java -Xmx1000m -cp bin:deps/poi.jar:deps/mysql.jar:deps/mina.jar:deps/slf4j.jar:deps/slf4j-nop.jar:deps/jython.jar:log4j-1.2.15.jar: server.Server
^[[Ajava.io.FileNotFoundException: ./data/cfg/prices.txt (No such file or directory)
        at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method)
        at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:138)
        at java.util.Scanner.<init>(Scanner.java:656)
        at server.world.ItemHandler.loadItemPrices(ItemHandler.java:316)
        at server.world.ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:35)
        at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:67)
./Data/CFG/npc.cfg: file not found.
./Data/CFG/spawn-config.cfg: file not found.
shops.cfg: file not found.
java.io.FileNotFoundException: data/lolmap.bin (No such file or directory)
        at java.io.RandomAccessFile.open(Native Method)
        at java.io.RandomAccessFile.<init>(RandomAccessFile.java:233)
        at java.io.RandomAccessFile.<init>(RandomAccessFile.java:118)
        at server.world.WalkingHandler.initialize(WalkingHandler.java:45)
        at server.Server.main(Server.java:119)
[7/22/12 6:41 PM]: Launching EternalRuins...
[7/22/12 6:41 PM]: java.io.FileNotFoundException: data/lolmap.bin (No such file or directory)
[7/22/12 6:41 PM]:      at java.io.RandomAccessFile.open(Native Method)
[7/22/12 6:41 PM]:      at java.io.RandomAccessFile.<init>(RandomAccessFile.java:233)
[7/22/12 6:41 PM]:      at java.io.RandomAccessFile.<init>(RandomAccessFile.java:118)
[7/22/12 6:41 PM]:      at server.world.WalkingHandler.initialize(WalkingHandler.java:45)
[7/22/12 6:41 PM]:      at server.Server.main(Server.java:174)
[7/22/12 6:41 PM]: Server listening on port 127.0.0.1:43594

Also I saw in there its missing 2 files, even though they’re both there!

Read full topic
